alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 9:14AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Sevier, McCurtain and Red River Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 914 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Big Cedar to 15 miles northeast of Fort Towson to 9 miles east of Arthur City to Sumner. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Idabel, Broken Bow, Bogata, Bagwell, Manchester, Wright City, Valliant, Detroit, Deport, Millerton, Annona, Haworth, Garvin, Eagletown, Rufe, Smithville, Hochatown, Watson and Goodwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
